name: Spaz's Readable Readability
description:
Readability preferes a serif font. And low-contrast almost-black text.
I do not.
additional_info: If you like to read articles with code samples in Readability, you might like this TamperMonkey script: https://github.com/spazmodius/bin/raw/master/config/TamperMonkey/Readability%20Code%20Syntax%20Highlight.tamper.js
